ingredients.content: 320 g dried pasta, short or long (e.g. penne, spaghetti)

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl and bring to the boil <b>10-12 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.

Add salt (optional) and dried pasta through hole in mixing bowl lid and cook <b>time indicated on package/100°C//speed 1<b> <b>without measuring cup<b>, until al dente. Drain pasta through Varoma dish and serve hot, plain or with a sauce as desired.
